# `SUPPORT.md` - Providing Clear Support Guidelines  

## **ğŸ“Œ Purpose**  
The `SUPPORT.md` file ensures users know **where and how** to get help.  
It reduces **unnecessary issue reports** and **improves community engagement**.

### **2ï¸âƒ£ Encourages Self-Help Before Asking**

1ï¸âƒ£ **Check the [Documentation](https://example.com/docs)** â€“ Your answer may already be there!  
2ï¸âƒ£ **Search [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/example/issues?q=is%3Aissue)** â€“ Someone else may have encountered the same problem.  
3ï¸âƒ£ **Try Debugging** â€“ Providing error logs and detailed steps improves response time.

### **3ï¸âƒ£ Helps Users Ask Better Questions**

âœ” **Provide clear details** (What are you trying to do? What did you expect? What happened instead?)  
âœ” **Include error messages, logs, and screenshots**.  
âœ” **List any troubleshooting steps you've already tried**.  
âœ” **Use a minimal reproducible example** (CodeSandbox, JSFiddle, or Gist).

## **ğŸ›  How to Use**
